detaileddescription.para: This hook is called when brand new entities are created, but they are not loaded so the hook_entity_load() is not yet called. We can use this hook to add properties to the entity before saving.

parameterdescription.para: The type of entity being created.
(OPTIONAL) The bundle object for the current entity.

detaileddescription.para: This function is used to support legacy Tripal v2 templates for use with Tripal v3 entities.
